alert.note: Alert for Chase (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 8:29AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Nebraska, including the following county, Chase. * WHEN...Until 115 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 729 AM MDT, Department of Highways reports portions of Highways 6 and 61 remain closed due to flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Imperial, Wauneta, Lamar, Champion, Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, Enders, Crete, Chase, Wanamaker State Wildfire Management Area, Church Grove Campground, Center Dam Campground and Area A Campground. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
